activities: Rolta International, Incorporated provides remote database administration services for its customers in the United States.  Some of these customers collect and store personally identifiable information of individuals in EU member countries.  As the database administration provider Rolta International, Incorporated may have access to that information and there is a potential that we may need to view this information in order to resolve customers' IT issues.  Rolta International, Incorporated does not store or collect this information for its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Rolta International Incorporated submits to the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) for dispute resolution.
